Sentencas: Nanopowders of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x (SSC) and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x (LSC) compositions, which are being investigated as cathode materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), were synthesized by a solution-combustion method using metal nitrates and glycine as fuel.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Development of crystalline phases in the as-synthesized powders after heat treatments at various temperatures was monitored by X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Combustion synthesis of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Perovskite phase in LSC formed more readily than in SSC.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Single-phase perovskites were obtained after heat treatment of the combustion synthesized LSC and SSC powders at 1000 and 1200 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The as-synthesized powders had an average particle size of similar to 12nm as determined from X-ray line broadening analysis using the Scherrer equation.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Average grain size of the powders increased with increase in calcination temperature.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Morphological analysis of the powders calcined at various temperatures was done by scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Combustion synthesis of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes
